_header: There stood beside the cross of Jesu
Title(s): ‘Meditacio de Passione Domini nostri ihesu cristi’
_description: ‘Meditacio de Passione Domini nostri ihesu cristi’ — fifteen eight-line stanzas

CamTCC601.First Lines:
there stood besyde the crosse of IhesuHys modyr hyr sustyr and also
                    IohnBeholdyng hys woundes bledyng all newThey syghyd þey sobbyd
                    euer in on…
CamTCC601.Last Lines:
…And euer abyde þere in þy syghtAmen Amen for
                    charyte
CamTCC601.Attributed Author:
John Lydgate (added later, f. 276vb); John Lydgate (added
                    later, f. 277vb)
CamTCC601.Attributed Title:
Sequitur Meditatio de Passione domini nostri Ihesu cristi (f.
                        276vb)
CamTCC601.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble. 
             “Lydgatiana.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         130 (1913): 286-311: 305.
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 144-8.
